fields.name: EndScreenDisplay
fields.fieldText: Your changes have been submitted.

fields.name: Grouping1
fields.fieldText:
For the following questions, indicate as accurately as possible whether your product has the specified capability.


ONLINE

fields.name: ONLINE1
fields.fieldText: Facilitates peer to peer discussion

fields.name: ONLINE2
fields.fieldText: Enables in-platform lecture streaming

fields.name: ONLINE3
fields.fieldText: Used actively to involve students during lecture

fields.name: ONLINE4
fields.fieldText: Used asynchronously outside of lecture

fields.name: ONLINE5
fields.fieldText: Includes audio/video recording capabilities

fields.name: ONLINE6
fields.fieldText: Contains features to ensure academic integrity in assignments

fields.name: ONLINE7
fields.fieldText: Offers remote or virtual lab experiences

fields.name: Grouping1_1
fields.fieldText: ADAPTIVITY

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY1
fields.fieldText: Adaptive presentation of content based on learner goals?

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY2
fields.fieldText: Adaptive complexity or presentation of content based on a learner's affective state

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY3
fields.fieldText: Ability to offer variation in level of content and/or depth of coverage

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY4
fields.fieldText: Customized learning paths based on student input

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY5
fields.fieldText: Ability for instructor to control adaptivity and personalization

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY6
fields.fieldText: Randomization of quantitative problems and steps

fields.name: ADAPTIVITY7
fields.fieldText: Adaptivity allows for a variation in level of content

fields.name: Grouping2
fields.fieldText: COURSE ADMINISTRATION

fields.name: COURSEADMINISTRATION1
fields.fieldText: Calendar links to assignments

fields.name: COURSEADMINISTRATION2
fields.fieldText: Online submission of assignments

fields.name: COURSEADMINISTRATION3
fields.fieldText: Real-time progress monitoring during assessments

fields.name: COURSEADMINISTRATION4
fields.fieldText: Ability to support faculty, mentors, or course designers interacting in relation to shared students

fields.name: COURSEADMINISTRATION5
fields.fieldText: Ability to generate or analyze a syllabus based on collected course content

fields.name: Grouping3
fields.fieldText: ASSIGNMENT MANAGEMENT

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT1
fields.fieldText: Ability for students to upload outside resources

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT2
fields.fieldText: Ability to edit assignments with no coding required

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT3
fields.fieldText: Ability to include multimedia content in assignments or assessments

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT4
fields.fieldText: System generates multiple versions of quantitative quesitons

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT5
fields.fieldText: Offers pre-tests that give students feedback

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT6
fields.fieldText: Ability to construct scientific structures (e.g., molecular drawing tools)

fields.name: ASSIGNMENTMANAGEMENT7
fields.fieldText: Ability to generate, administer, and proctor summative assessments

fields.name: Grouping4
fields.fieldText: LEARNER AUTONOMY

fields.name: LEARNERAUTONOMY1
fields.fieldText: Support for learners to share their work or evidence of learning outside of the course (e.g. digital badges, e-portfolio artifacts)

fields.name: LEARNERAUTONOMY2
fields.fieldText: Gives learners on-demand access to assessments or interactive objects that are not a required element of instruction

fields.name: LEARNERAUTONOMY3
fields.fieldText: Prompts learners for self-reflection or evaluation

fields.name: Grouping5
fields.fieldText: COLLABORATION

fields.name: COLLABORATION1
fields.fieldText: Prompts learners to provide or receive feedback on or from peers

fields.name: COLLABORATION2
fields.fieldText: Facilitates interaction with peers during learning activities

fields.name: COLLABORATION3
fields.fieldText: Educators or mentors and learners can initiate contact with one another within the courseware interface

fields.name: COLLABORATION4
fields.fieldText: Prompts learners to act as a tutor or mentor

fields.name: Grouping6
fields.fieldText: CONTENT MANAGEMENT

fields.name: CONTENTMANAGEMENT1
fields.fieldText: Batch file uploads

fields.name: CONTENTMANAGEMENT2
fields.fieldText: Resource sharing among educators, mentors, or course designers

fields.name: CONTENTMANAGEMENT3
fields.fieldText: Content discovery and sharing among courses

fields.name: Grouping7
fields.fieldText: CUSTOMIZATION

fields.name: CUSTOMIZATION1
fields.fieldText: Repository of additional assessment items that can be incorporated by educators of course designers

fields.name: CUSTOMIZATION2
fields.fieldText: Repository of additional content that can be incorporated by educators or course designers

fields.name: CUSTOMIZATION3
fields.fieldText: Ability to create and edit learning objectives or outcomes

fields.name: CUSTOMIZATION4
fields.fieldText: Ability to re-order and delete learning content and assessments

fields.name: CUSTOMIZATION5
fields.fieldText: Ability to re-order and delete learning objectives or outcomes

fields.name: Grouping8
fields.fieldText: FEEDBACK TO STUDENTS AND INSTRUCTORS

fields.name: FEEDBACK1
fields.fieldText: Early warning system for instructors identifying students with performance issues

fields.name: FEEDBACK2
fields.fieldText: Ability to track the progress of students cohorts and individual students in single view

fields.name: FEEDBACK3
fields.fieldText: Students receive feedback on knowledge gaps

fields.name: FEEDBACK4
fields.fieldText: Ability for learner to track progress and remaining tasks in the same interface

fields.name: FEEDBACK5
fields.fieldText: Multi-part feedback for students

fields.name: FEEDBACK6
fields.fieldText: Ability to measure student's level of understanding

fields.name: Grouping9
fields.fieldText: GRADING

fields.name: GRADING1
fields.fieldText: Ability to change or add scores in gradebook

fields.name: GRADING2
fields.fieldText: Analytics on both class-level and student-level competencies

fields.name: GRADING3
fields.fieldText: Ability for students to work and be graded as a group

fields.name: GRADING4
fields.fieldText: Learner portfolio tools

fields.name: GRADING5
fields.fieldText: Ability to add scores using standards or rubric-based grading

fields.name: GRADING6
fields.fieldText: Ability to adjust grading tolerances: e.g., significant figure adjustments

fields.name: Grouping10
fields.fieldText: INTERACTIVITY

fields.name: INTERACTIVITY1
fields.fieldText: Ability for students to highlight and annotate content

fields.name: INTERACTIVITY2
fields.fieldText: Different representations of the same content in learning modules

fields.name: INTERACTIVITY3
fields.fieldText: Gaming components

fields.name: INTERACTIVITY4
fields.fieldText: System assesses student's previous knowledge and automatically serves follow-up -- questions for spaced practice

fields.name: INTERACTIVITY5
fields.fieldText: Simulations that allow students to predict outcomes and analyze data

fields.name: INTERACTIVITY6
fields.fieldText: Offers varying means of learner action and expression (e.g., physical actions, use of multiple media, interactive objects, and executive functions)

fields.name: Grouping11
fields.fieldText: LMS INTEGRATION

fields.name: LMS1
fields.fieldText: Gives analytics back to my LMS

fields.name: LMS2
fields.fieldText: Sends grade information to my LMS

fields.name: LMS3
fields.fieldText: Single sign-on (lets students log in with their college account information)

fields.name: Grouping12
fields.fieldText: MEASUREMENT

fields.name: MEASUREMENT1
fields.fieldText: Ability to instrument new assessment items or activities based on learner experiences or performance

fields.name: MEASUREMENT2
fields.fieldText: Assessments in most or all learning modules

fields.name: MEASUREMENT3
fields.fieldText: Learning outcomes have been mapped to learning objectives

fields.name: Grouping13
fields.fieldText: REPORTING

fields.name: REPORTING1
fields.fieldText: Competency-based reporting

fields.name: REPORTING2
fields.fieldText: Ability to view student workload

fields.name: Grouping14
fields.fieldText: SCAFFOLDING

fields.name: SCAFFOLDING1
fields.fieldText: Offers hints or prompts to support learners during learning activities or assessment items

fields.name: SCAFFOLDING2
fields.fieldText: Prompts learners to generate explanations of how they have approached an activity

fields.name: SCAFFOLDING3
fields.fieldText: Contains prompts for mental practice

fields.name: SCAFFOLDING4
fields.fieldText: Presents narrative structures that act as guidelines for learning activities

fields.name: SCAFFOLDING5
fields.fieldText: Incorporates social / emotional interventions designed to improve learner study skills, work habits, and attitude

fields.name: Grouping15
fields.fieldText: USABILITY

fields.name: USABILITY1
fields.fieldText: Contains design features that help users orient themselves with the software

fields.name: USABILITY2
fields.fieldText: Contains glossary of terms specific to the learning content of the course

fields.name: USABILITY3
fields.fieldText: Ability for learner to save partial progress within a module

fields.name: Grouping16
fields.fieldText: ACCESSIBILITY

fields.name: ACCESSIBILITY1
fields.fieldText: Alternate language support for UI elements

fields.name: ACCESSIBILITY2
fields.fieldText: Alternate language support for some or most learning content

fields.name: ACCESSIBILITY3
fields.fieldText: Complies with WCAG 2.0 AA standards

fields.name: ACCESSIBILITY4
fields.fieldText: Voluntary Product Accessibility Template (VPAT) available

fields.name: ACCESSIBILITY5
fields.fieldText: Aligned with Universal Design for Learning standards
